summary: The diff does not demonstrate a rollback of the recent blink/color changes. Instead, it introduces/retains multiple animations and styling changes (e.g., gallery glow, floating button ping/pulse, Tailwind animation tokens, and a noted live-blink heading in SchemeGrid per the file summary). There is no clear evidence that the specified blink-related utility classes (`icon-live-blink-2s`, `heading-primary-live`, `close-x-live-blink-3s`) were removed from all React components or that their corresponding CSS/animation definitions were disabled/removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the recently introduced "live blink" icon animation across the site by eliminating usage of the `icon-live-blink-2s` class and removing (or disabling) the corresponding CSS animation so icons no longer blink.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show removal of `icon-live-blink-2s` usages or removal/disablement of its CSS/keyframes. Additionally, other icon-related animations remain (e.g., ping/pulse/glow effects), which conflicts with the acceptance criterion that no icons blink anywhere.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore headings to their previous styling by removing the `heading-primary-live` class wherever applied and removing (or disabling) its CSS so headings are no longer forced to dark red and do not blink.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence is shown that `heading-primary-live` was removed from components or that its CSS was removed/disabled. The file summary explicitly mentions a 'dark red section heading with 2-second live blink animation' in SchemeGrid, which suggests heading blink behavior still exists somewhere.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore modal/overlay close (X) buttons to their previous appearance by removing the `close-x-live-blink-3s` class from all close icons and removing (or disabling) its CSS so close icons are not forced red and do not blink.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows X icons styled as `text-official-primary`, but does not provide evidence that `close-x-live-blink-3s` was removed everywhere or that its CSS was removed/disabled. Without explicit removal evidence, the requirement is not verifiably implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit and revert any other visual changes introduced specifically to support the new blinking/color update set (including any helper classes added only for that update) so the site matches the look and behavior of the pre-change version.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes/retains various new or non-rollback animations/utilities (gallery glow animation, modal enter animations, ping effects, Tailwind pulse ring animation token per summary) rather than demonstrating removal of blink/color utilities. The summary also indicates ongoing animation support rather than a cleanup of blink-related utilities.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained new visual animations and effects unrelated to the rollback request (e.g., gallery glow animation, modal enter animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly says to rollback blinking/color changes and lists non-goals including adding new animations or additional visual effects. The diff introduces/keeps multiple animations.

hallucinated_features.description: Floating call button includes an `animate-ping` effect behind the phone icon (a blinking/pulsing effect).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is to remove blink animations across the site and avoid new animations. `animate-ping` is an attention-drawing pulse effect on an icon area.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration extended with a looping 'soft glowing ring blink effect on the floating action button' (per summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; conflicts with rollback and non-goal of adding animations/effects.

hallucinated_features.description: SchemeGrid described as having a 'dark red section heading with 2-second live blink animation' (per summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: This is the opposite of the rollback requirements (headings should not blink; remove live/blink utilities).

hallucinated_features.description: Non-rollback content/feature additions in UI components (e.g., IPPB overlay dialog described as 'premium animations' and a prompt-copy section).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest's non-goals include not introducing new features or changing site content/structure beyond rollback of blinking/color changes. These appear to be new/expanded features/content not tied to removing blink utilities.
